thread.title: This Story About Some Lost Keys Will Make You Say, “Kids, Man”
thread.title_full: This Story About Some Lost Keys Will Make You Say, “Kids, Man”

author: Mike Spohr
title: This Story About Some Lost Keys Will Make You Say, “Kids, Man”
text:
View this image ›
Pinterest ID: 10382658 2. Well, my wife and I made one and we like it — especially because it’s a convenient place to hang our keys. View this image ›
Spohr/BuzzFeed ID: 10380807 3. But we made a HUGE mistake — we put the key hooks low enough that our 3-year-old could reach them. View this image ›
CBS ID: 10380981 4. So… story time… a few weeks ago I was getting ready to leave when I saw — dun dun dun — my keys were gone! View this image ›
NBC ID: 10381018 5. I retraced my steps and looked in my pockets, but no keys. View this image ›
MTV / Via teenwolf.tumblr.com ID: 10381073 6. I asked my wife and 7-year-old daughter if they knew where my keys were, but they were like: View this image ›
NBC ID: 10381231 7. Finally, knowing the hook was low enough for my three-year-old to reach, I interrogated him. His response? “Keys are for doors!” View this image ›
Fox ID: 10381301 8. “Yes,” I said. “Do you know where MINE are? Did you take them off the hook?” And he said, “Keys make cars go vroom!” View this image ›
Warner ID: 10381312 9. This had me like: View this image ›
VH1 ID: 10382380 10. So I searched the ENTIRE house for days. Under the couch, in closets, in shoes, you name it. View this image ›
Hanna-Barbera Productions BUT NO KEYS!
ID: 10381457 11. I even came up with scenarios, like “What if THE DOG did it? What if the keys got knocked off the hook and she picked them up and hid them in her cage?!” View this image ›
knowyourmeme.com But when I crawled into her cage… NO KEYS.
ID: 10381475 12. At that point I realized I wasn’t going to find my keys any time soon. View this image ›
WB ID: 10381560 13. Making do, I found the spare key to my car and went with that (which meant that I had to manually open my car door without the key fob — oh the humanity.) View this image ›
Fox ID: 10381665 14. And because I no longer had a house key my wife had to let me in every day. View this image ›
NBC One time I got home before her and I had to sit in the car for five minutes waiting. OH THE HUMANITY, PART II!
ID: 10381692 But then…BUT THEN… View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10381773 15. A couple nights ago I woke at 3 a.m. to hear my three-year-old crying, “Daddy! Daddy!” I raced into his room and discovered he’d had a night terror. View this image ›
Pixar/Disney ID: 10381809 16. Upon seeing me he cried out, “Daddy in bed with me!” He looked frightened, so I got in and let him cuddle up. View this image ›
MTV Picture the above but with, like, a 3-year-old.
ID: 10381886 17. This calmed him down, and right before he fell back to sleep he said, “Daddy keys in green chair.” I was like, “WHAT?!” View this image ›
Paramount But before he could say any more he dozed off.
ID: 10382002 18. The next morning I asked him, “Which green chair has the keys?” He then took me to this rarely-used chair in our living room, lifted up the cushion, and… View this image ›
Spohr/BuzzFeed ID: 10382016 19. THERE WERE MY MOTHER#$@&ING KEYS!!! View this image ›
VH1 ID: 10382089 20. Once the euphoria wore off I had a lot of questions, like: Did he know the keys were there this WHOLE time? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10382251 21. Not only that, but did he know the keys were there but said nothing every single time I’ve complained about not having my keys over these last THREE WEEKS? View this image ›
imgur.com ID: 10382267 22. Or did he forget he hid them and just remembered recently? View this image ›
Marvel (I’m hoping this is the case.)
ID: 10382259 23. Why did he finally tell me where they were when he did? View this image ›
Harpo Productions ID: 10382246 24. Was he like, “Hey, dad is being cool about this night terror thing, so maybe I’ll do him a solid and finally tell him where I hid the keys.” View this image ›
HBO If this is true, I truly fear the teenage years.
ID: 10382282 25. Long story short — and in conclusion: View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382366
